parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Article - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ge and the base of ergon; a land-worker, i.e. Farmer.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To reason (with), debate (with), consider. From dia and logizomai; to reckon thoroughly, i.e. to deliberate.

parse: Preposition
str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Article - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kleros and the base of nomos (reflexively) getting by apportionment); a sharer by lot, i.e. Inheritor; by implication, a possessor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Conjunction
str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Article - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From kleronomos; heirship, i.e. a patrimony or a possession.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
